lyrics.text: Listen to the tape, then answer this question.
lyrics.translation: 听录音，然后回答这个问题。

lyrics.text: Which car was the winner in 1995?
lyrics.translation: 哪辆车在1995年赢得了比赛？

lyrics.text: There is a car race near our town every year.
lyrics.translation: 每年我们镇附近都有一场汽车比赛。

lyrics.text: In 1995, there was a very big race.
lyrics.translation: 在1995年，有一个非常大的比赛。

lyrics.text: There were hundreds of people there.
My wife and I were at the race.
lyrics.translation: 我和我的妻子在比赛现场。

lyrics.text: Our friends, Julie and Jack, were there too.
lyrics.translation: 我们的朋友，朱莉和杰克，也在那里。

lyrics.text: You can see us in the crowd.
lyrics.translation: 你可以在人群中看到我们。

lyrics.text: We are standing on the left.
There were 20 cars in the race.
There were English cars, French cars, German cars, Italian cars, American cars, and Japanese
lyrics.translation: 有英国车，法国车，德国车，意大利车，美国车和日本车。
这是一个激动人心的结局。
获胜者是比利·斯图尔特。

lyrics.text: Five other cars were just behind him.
lyrics.translation: 五辆其他车就在他后面。

lyrics.text: On the way home, my wife said to me, don't drive so quickly.
lyrics.translation: 在回家的路上，我妻子对我说，不要开得太快。
